resources.string: "Howdy! My name is Sydney Jamison, I am a senior International Studies major with a focus in Politics and Diplomacy with minors in French and Economics. Growing up as an Air Force BRAT, I was exposed to different and conflicting opinions. I believe that my passion for this organization can drive it to success and encourage others to be comfortable with the vast contrasting views that we encounter daily."

"Howdy! I'm Maddie, and I'm the Vice President for Texas A&M Moderates. I'm a senior International Studies with a focus in Global Cultural Studies and a minor in French. I'm a first generation Ag, and my hometown is Temple, Texas."

"Hey y'all ! My name is Augustin and I am the founding treasurer for TAMM. I am a geology major and Navy veteran, class of '19 Ayy, Whoop! I enjoy meeting others and discussion on various topics with them, I love to formulate ways to get others to think with clarity and inclusion! I have a passion for the earth, economics and business with clients. This year is going to be a blast and we look forward to your interest in TAMM!"

"Mariana Gama is an honors student at A&M, majoring in International Studies and minoring in French and Psychology. In Texas A&M Moderates, she is a director of internal affairs and hopes to partake in the organization's goal of creating open-mindedness and bridging the two party divide. At Texas A&M she is also part of the International Student Mentorship Association (ISMA), No Lost Generation, and the Fellowship of Catholic University Students (FOCUS). Originally from Colombia, she is passionate about world issues and has spent much of her life traveling and doing volunteer work in developing countries. Her passions/hobbies also include photography, music, rock climbing, and dancing. She aspires to one day achieve a career in human rights work."

"Justin Holifield is an RPTS major with a focus on hotel and tourism management. I am one of the Internal Affairs Directors in Aggie Moderates, and personally enjoy local as well as international politics. My personal interests include working as a purchasing agent and reading."

"Howdy y'all, my name is Troy, and I have the pleasure of serving as the Director of Public Relations for the inaugural year of Texas A&M Moderates. I am a junior, Graphic Design major from Baytown, Texas. I have a passion for art and design, so I am extremely excited to bring my skills to such an amazing organization. Some of my hobbies include, hiking, kayaking, camping, reading, and doing stupid things with my friends. I hope to one day write, illustrate, and publish a graphic novel."

Our organization as the Texas A&M Moderates mission is to provide a compassionate environment with the intentions to encourage political discussion, educate students of both communal and global issues, through the collaboration of diverse political opinions.
The Flow and Movement of Freedom of Speech - 11/18/18\nTAMM Sponsor Speech (LAST MEETING) - 11/25/18\nEnd of Semester Social - 12/01/18
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
